name: 書報討論（四）－碩士班
description: 本課程旨在協助學生瞭解機電系統、機電整合技術、機電科技應用技術，及機電技術的發展現況與未來趨勢。使學生能瞭解機電科技之內涵及應用，並針對機電整合主題作深入研究，俾於理論或實務有所創新。
goals: 瞭解機電系統、機電整合技術、機電科技應用技術
瞭解機電技術的發展現況與未來趨勢
針對機電整合主題作深入研究，俾於理論或實務有所創新
syllabus:
\[Teaching duration: 16+2 weeks\], that is, "16 weeks regular course + 2 weeks flexible teaching (17th and 18th weeks)"

Weeks 1~16: Thematic speeches and discussions  
Weeks 17-18: Flexible digital teaching time

1\. Introduction to Electromechanical System Technology  
2\. Electromechanical integration technology  
3\. Electromechanical technology application technology  
4\. Current status and future trends of electromechanical technology  
5-7. Research Report on Electromechanical Science and Technology Papers (I)  
8-10. Research Report on Mechanical and Electrical Technology Papers ( II )  
11-12. Project Study on Electromechanical System (I)  
13-14. Project Study on Electromechanical Systems ( II )  
15-16. Products and Markets of Electromechanical Systems  
17-18. Flexible Teaching (Digital Learning)

methodologies.note: Speakers (including experts, scholars and graduate students) report topics
